sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.C_ID , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM $boardID$ WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_REG_ID = #regId# , C_CONTENT = #content# , C_ALLOW_COMMENT_FL = #allowCommentFL# , C_ALLOW_REPLY_FL = #allowReplyFL# , C_ALERT_RESPONSE_FL = #alerResponseFL# , C_OPEN_ARTICLE_FL = #openArticleFL# , C_ANNOUNCEMENT_FL = ## , C_VIEW_CNT = #viewCnt# , C_IS_DELETED_FL = #isDeletedFL# , C_REG_DT = #regDt# , C_MOD_DT = #modDt# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_REG_ID , C_CONTENT , C_ALLOW_COMMENT_FL , C_ALLOW_REPLY_FL , C_ALERT_RESPONSE_FL , C_OPEN_ARTICLE_FL , C_ANNOUNCEMENT_FL , C_VIEW_CNT , C_IS_DELETED_FL , C_REG_DT , C_MOD_DT FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_REG_ID , C_CONTENT , C_ALLOW_COMMENT_FL , C_ALLOW_REPLY_FL , C_ALERT_RESPONSE_FL , C_OPEN_ARTICLE_FL , C_ANNOUNCEMENT_FL , C_VIEW_CNT , C_IS_DELETED_FL , C_REG_DT , C_MOD_DT FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM $boardID$ WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE $boardID$ SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
